name: rooms
description: A small app to view meeting room availability for Google Calendar.
author: Matthias Loker

scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist/js ; browserify app/js/main.js | uglifyjs2 -o dist/js/app.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
scripts.build: npm run build:js & npm run build:css ; cp app/index.html dist/index.html
